title: How much does it cost to build a 1 square mile floating island? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you will get better answer if you ask Naval Architect this question, it is simply depends on many factors, as the height of the waves, what do you want to build/keep on this island and so on and on. I build once pontoon from empty drums that was caring sand over more or less steady water, for about 10 tones of sand I have used about 60 drums of 200lt’s each

i think I could do it for about $1 a square foot which is around $33 million. That works out to $52,000 and acre. Well, there is a lot of land around the world, for only $1,000 an acre or less. So, it would still be better to buy the land, I think.
